Romantic Getaways From Bangalore

Running out of date ideas in Bangalore? Here is a list of a few romantic getaways from Bangalore where you and your loved one can have a wonderful time. Sometimes, instead of taking a passport one ca (Read More)n just rent a car to drive outside the busy city. Here is a list of places which one should visit to have a long romantic time worth remembering their lifetime.

Here is the list of 14 Romantic Getaways From Bangalore For A Perfect Honeymoon

1. Coorg, Karnataka - Best Place Near Bangalore for Honeymoon

4.2 /5 View 31+ photos

Known For : Abbey Falls Mandalpatti Raja's Seat

If staying close to nature with your loved one seems far-fetched, then this is the place worth exploring. Coorg also has tourists from abroad as its enchanting beauty, and mystifying quality plays an intriguing role in attracting people all over the globe. A 6-hour long ride to this romantic getaway from Bangalore will bring you to the beautiful landscapes of Coorg. In fact, it is one of the most preferred places for couples looking for some solitude. For those who love a bit of adventure, boating is highly recommended.

Distance from Bangalore: 267 km

Best Time: October to March

37 Coorg Attractions

View Packages Read More

2. Ooty, Tamil Nadu - Popular romantic getaway from Bangalore

4.5 /5 View 30+ photos

Known For : Nilgiri Mountain Railway Ooty Lake Dolphin's Nose, Ooty

A small romantic getaway from Bangalore wrapped up in an atmosphere tinged with love. Lying amidst green hills, dense forests and beautiful lakes, Ooty is the Queen of Hill Stations and one of the most popular romantic getaways from Bangalore. Ooty is a must visit for those couples who like the laid back life with chilly weather and delicious food. However, there is no dearth of adventure here. Angling, hand gliding and trekking are few of the many sports available. Adding to the list, Ooty is pocket-friendly too. It is a tourist place; hence it overflows with cosy cottages, hotels and lodges. It's the perfect place to relax in the hills and also take in all the beauty of the natural surroundings, with your loved one.

Distance from Bangalore: 272 km

Best Time: Throughout the year

43 Ooty Attractions

View Packages Read More

3. Gokarna, Karnataka- Romantic escape from Bangalore

4.2 /5 View 21+ photos

Known For : Om Beach Mahabaleshwara Temple Paradise Beach, Gokarna

Offbeat and untouched as it is, Gokarna attracts a lot of visitors at almost all times of the year. The beautiful golden beaches, the mild February sun and the whole idea of Gokarna make this romantic getaway from Bangalore a beautiful Valentine's destination. If you haven't visited Gokarna yet, this is your chance. Go, set the mood this romantic season!

Distance from Bangalore: 481 km

Best Time: Throughout the year

20 Gokarna Attractions

View Packages Read More

4. Coonoor, Tamil Nadu

4.7 /5 View 5+ photos

Known For : Sim's Park Dolphin's Nose Ketti Valley

One of the loveliest romantic getaways from Bangalore, Coonoor is a picturesque view of the Nilgiris and the Catherine Falls. The perpetually misty landscape added to the greenery multiplies the romantic quotient of Coonoor manifold. It is a perfect place for spending time with each other in this beautiful and innocent beginning of their life. There are several things to experience in this wonderful place like Dolphin's Nose Viewpoint.

Distance from Bangalore: 291 km

Best Time: October to March

17 Coonoor Attractions

View Packages Read More

5. Maravanthe, Karnataka

4.0 /5 View 16+ photos

Known For : Padukone Village Kodachadri Maravanthe Beach

A beach romantic getaway from Bangalore that calls out divinely for some days off the hook and a lovely road trip, Maravanthe is a less explored, less traversed option for Bangaloreans. The cool serenity, coupled with the peaceful vibe and the awesome climate that is to be found right now will make this one an absolute relish for Valentine's. Make this place your own and go for a romantic trip near Bangalore.

Distance from Bangalore: 429 km

Best Time: October to March

10 Maravanthe Attractions

View Hotels Read More

6. Hogenakkal, Tamil Nadu

4.5 /5 View 10+ photos

Known For : Hogenakkal Falls Mettur Dam Melagiri Hills

What's better than a waterfall, you ask? The Kaveri splitting into multiple streams of waterfalls in Hogenakkal, we say! Hogenakkal is a beautiful getaway for you both to rekindle your fire with mesmerizing sights and sounds to behold with intertwined fingers.

Distance from Bangalore: 127 km

Best Time: October to March

9 Hogenakkal Attractions

View Packages Read More

7. Goa - Exciting romantic getaway from Bangalore

4.9 /5 View 114+ photos

Known For : Calangute Beach Baga Beach Dudhsagar Falls

Famous all over the country and also in the world for its lovely beaches, Goa is an ideal romantic getaway from Bangalore. There are plenty of not-so-crowded spots and beaches in Goa, where you can relax and spend some quality time with your significant other.

Distance from Bangalore: 595 km

Best Time: October to March

198 Goa Attractions

View Packages Read More

8. Mysore, Karnataka

4.7 /5 View 35+ photos

Known For : Mysore Palace Brindavan Gardens Mysore Zoo

A two-hour ride from Bangalore, Mysore happens to be the next closest destination. Historically, the city happened to be a favourite of all Kings. With a blend of both modern and traditional ways, Mysore flaunts its own pristine beauty. Many famous places like Mysore palace, Ranganthittu birds' sanctuary, Somnathpura and Bandipur national park are present here. Travelling together and exploring new places is one of the most romantic things ever.

Distance from Bangalore: 143 km

Best Time: Throughout the year

36 Mysore Attractions

View Packages Read More

9. Kabini, Karnataka

4.3 /5 View 15+ photos

Known For : Jungle Safari, Kabini Boating in Kabini

Kabini River Cabin, an offbeat romantic getaway from Bangalore with wildlife, greenery and the beautiful Kabini River, is a lovely getaway for the two of you. Want to amp up the romance? Do Kabini on a bike trip with the wind in your hair and the flutter in your hearts! There is no more surefire way to get those city jitters killed!

Distance from Bangalore: 171 km

Best Time: Throughout the year

5 Kabini Attractions

View Packages Read More

10. Bandipur National Park, Karnataka

4.0 /5 View 29+ photos

Known For : Gopalaswamy Hills Nilgiri Biosphere Reserve

A couple exploring the wilderness. Could it get any more romantic? Plan a trip to Bandipur and immerse yourself in the scenic, raw beauty of this place. Famous for tiger spotting, you will also find elephants and several rare animal and bird species here.

Distance from Bangalore: 223 km

Best Time: October to May

2 Bandipur Attractions

View Packages Read More

11. Wayanad, Kerala - Romantic getaway from Bangalore for nature lovers

4.3 /5 View 71+ photos

Known For : Edakkal Caves Banasura Sagar Dam Chembra Peak

The Land of Paddy Fields is thickly surrounded by forests. It is situated on the southern tip of the Deccan Plateau, its beauty being intensified by the Western Ghats with lofty ridges and clear lakes. If both of you are nature lovers, then this romantic getaway from Bangalore is waiting for you. Numerous places are there to visit in Wayanad like Meenmutty falls, Pookot Lake, Soochipara waterfall, Chembra peak and Ghati viewpoint. The romantic life can catch a spark if both of you move beyond the comforts of luxurious beds and hotels and take pleasure in a bamboo house, tree house camping and many others.

Distance from Bangalore: 283 km

Best Time: Throughout the year

46 Wayanad Attractions

View Packages Read More

12. Bheemeshwari

4.3 /5 View 18+ photos

Known For : Cauvery Fishing Camp Doddamakali Nature Camp Boat Rides in Bheemeshwari

For couples with a streak of adventure, this is one place which should be on your cards. It is located in the south of Bangalore by the river Cauvery. Nearly 100 kilometres away from Bangalore, this place is sure to take your breath away! Mahseer is the attraction point of this location. This largest tropical game fish along with many other wild organisms inhabit this place. The best time to visit is during the monsoon when the place comes alive with all sorts of creatures which one might never get to see in their lifetime.

Distance from Bangalore: 102 km

Best Time: Throughout the year

8 Bheemeshwari Attractions

View Hotels Read More

13. Yercaud, Tamil Nadu - Cozy romantic getaway from Bangalore

4.8 /5 View 28+ photos

Known For : Emerald Lake, Yercaud Pagoda Point Botanical Garden, Yercaud

As they say, some things cannot be expressed but experienced. Yercaud is one of them. Located amidst the breathtaking Shevaroys Hills in the Eastern Ghats, this romantic getaway from Bangalore is filled with all sorts of things to keep one engaged like the lakes, waterfalls, parks and many colonial buildings. The climate is just ideal as it never exceeds 30 degrees Celsius. It is advisable to visit the place during winter. The chilly temperature will provide warmth to your new life!

Distance from Bangalore: 230 km

Best Time: October to June

20 Yercaud Attractions

View Packages Read More

14. Pondicherry

4.5 /5 View 29+ photos

Known For : Paradise Beach, Pondicherry Aurobindo Ashram Auroville

Chill, walk around in flip-flops and shorts and explore the beautiful land of Pondy. Meditate, beach-bathe, sunbathe or simply walk around in the loveliest union territory of the country, Pondicherry sure is an idyllic getaway if it is the romance that you crave!

Distance from Bangalore: 313 km

Best Time: October to March

48 Pondicherry Attractions

View Packages Read More

Whoever said Bangalore is only meant for big IT companies and worker? Romantic places from Bangalore are plenty in number. People say that Bangalore is the USA of India because of its fast paced life but what many don't know that there also exist places which are on the outskirts of the city and full of serenity.
Get packed. Push off. Pack your partner's bags too, and give them a solid surprise that'll get you those brownie points that we all love so much.

This post was published by Pallavi Siddhanta
